    • Transformation of Features with Package mlfeaturer

List Representation of Preprocessed Data

feature_data_list-class.Rd

An S4 class to represent the preprocessed data as a list.

Slots

x_train

Training data (X).

x_test

Test data (X).

x_all

All data (X).

y_train

Training data (Y).

y_test

Test data (Y).

y_all

All data (Y).

x_train_scaled

Scaled training data (X).

x_test_scaled

Scaled test data (X).

x_all_scaled

Scaled all data (X).

Developed by Thomas Petzoldt.

Site built with pkgdown 2.1.3.
